1.1 	 Individual	
We will pay Loss incurred by You in respect of any 
Offering Claim first made against You during the Policy 
Period up to the extent of limit of liability specified in 
Item 3 of the Schedule.
1.2.	 Company Reimbursement

any Offering Claim first made against You during the 
Policy Period then We will pay such Loss on behalf of 
the Company up to the extent of limit of liabilit
